topic.title: Local ISO on Foreman Node
topic.shortdesc: Run these steps to configure the installation medium from a local ISO on the Foreman node:

ol.li: Run the following command on the Foreman server node:# mkdir /usr/share/foreman/public/iso
Copy the RHEL7 iso to the /root directory of the foreman node.
Edit /etc/fstab to add the following line to the end:/root/RHEL-7.0-Server-x86_64-dvd.iso /usr/share/foreman/public/iso iso9660 loop,ro 0 0
Run the following command:# mount â€“a

Run the following command. The path included in the example below should work with most satellite installations, just replace FOREMAN_SERVER with the appropriate FQDN. # hammer medium create --name "Dell OSP Pilot" --os-family Redhat \ --path 'http://FOREMAN_SERVER/iso'
